meanings.sent1: She kept overboiling the pasta until it turned mushy.
meanings.sent2: I always end up overboiling the eggs when I get distracted.
meanings.sent3: The chef's attempt to overboil the soup resulted in a kitchen disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like an overboiling pot, ready to spill over at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The water in the pot was overboiling furiously, creating a cloud of steam.

meanings.definition: The act of boiling too much.
meanings.sent1: The overboiling of the milk left a burnt smell in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The overboiling of the water caused it to spill over the pot.
meanings.sent3: The overboiling of the tea made it taste bitter and unpleasant.
meanings.sent4: The overboiling of emotions in the room made it feel tense and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The overboiling of the soup created a mess on the stove that took hours to clean up.
